qas.question: Who arrested Chen Fan in a failed plot?
Who made accusations of treason against Dou Wu?
How did Dou Wu pass away?

answers.text: he was forced to commit suicide

qas.question: Which group was favorable to Zhang Huan?
What type of action was attempted on the eunuchs?

context: Following Huan's death, Dou Wu and the Grand Tutor Chen Fan (陳蕃) (d. 168 AD) attempted a <a4_0>coup d'état<a4_0/> against the eunuchs Hou Lan (d. 172 AD), Cao Jie (d. 181 AD), and Wang Fu (王甫). When the plot was uncovered, <a0_0>the eunuchs<a0_0/> arrested Empress Dowager Dou (d. 172 AD) and Chen Fan. <a1_0>General Zhang Huan<a1_0/> (張奐) favored <a3_0>the eunuchs<a3_0/>. He and his troops confronted Dou Wu and his retainers at the palace gate where each side shouted accusations of treason against the other. When the retainers gradually deserted Dou Wu, <a2_0>he was forced to commit suicide<a2_0/>.
